body:
How ya doing everybody?
You may or may have not heard that this year, 2016, Ubisoft won't be creating another game for the series, but instead they are taking the time to fix and think of a new series as they call it "broken" and during that time they will be making an Assassin's Creed Movie which comes out the 21st of December!
What are your thoughts and opinions about it?
I got my info from here: http://fraghero.com/there-wont-be-a-new-assassins-creed-game-this-year-ubisoft-confirms-and-heres-wh...
Don't believe it's reliable? I'm sure IMBD don't lie about upcoming movies : http://www.imdb.com/title/tt2094766/
Have a great day ;]

title: Assassin's Creed Movie [Your Opinion]

replies.body: it will be as bad as AC: Unity (I hate it)
replies.body_tagged: it will be as bad as AC: Unity (I hate it)

reply_to.body: it will be as bad as AC: Unity (I hate it)
reply_to.body_tagged: it will be as bad as AC: Unity (I hate it)

replies.body: Looking forward to it. I like anything with action. Hopefully it's not garbage
replies.body_tagged: Looking forward to it. I like anything with action. Hopefully it's not garbage

replies.body: AC had a good story-line, and plot. If the movie incorporates all the plot of the older games, it shouldn't be bad.
replies.body_tagged: AC had a good story-line, and plot. If the movie incorporates all the plot of the older games, it shouldn't be bad.

replies.body: It releases on my birthday lol. I think it would be cool.
replies.body_tagged: It releases on my birthday lol. I think it would be cool.

replies.body:
Actually, Rogue was decent, though it could never hope to compete with 2, Brotherhood and Revelations.
P.S: I need more Altair - The coolest Assassin.
